DOC.brief_summary: Retrospective analysis on colonoscopies in the endoscopy unit of the Lyell McEwin Hospital.
DOC.brief_title: Retrospective Study on Epidemiology of Colorectal Lesions
DOC.detailed_description: Colonoscopy reports will be manually searched by the investigator to evaluate epidemiology on colorectal lesions.
DOC.criteria: Colonoscopies performed in Lyell McEwin Hospital between 20102016 Sigmoidoscopies
